text: Jupiter Entertainment Ventures Private Limited is a Bengaluru based entertainment venture company which was founded by Rajeev Chandrasekhar in 2006. It is a subsidiary of the investment firm Jupiter Capital Private Limited. It owns and operates several media companies like Suvarna News, Asianet News and Kannada Prabha. It also owns radio brands including Best FM and Radio Indigo as well as Jupiter Entertainment and Indigo Films. ==References== Category:Entertainment companies of India
title: Jupiter Entertainment Ventures
